text:
「うん、いいよ誕生日なんだ、皿洗いくらい俺がやっておくよ」
頭を撫でながらこめかみにキスをすればくすくすと渉が笑う。
「ふふ、ではお言葉に甘えてお先お風呂貰いますね」
ちゅ、と渉も俺の頬にキスをすると渉はリビングから出ていった。
さて、と俺もソファから立ち上がりシンクに置いておいた食器へ手を伸ばす。
少しして寝巻きとバスタオルを抱えた渉が戻ってきた。
「じゃあ、お願いしますね！」
trans:
"Yes sure, it is your birthday, after all. I will take care of the dishes."
When I kissed his temple while patting his head, Wataru chuckled softly.
"Hehe, well then, I will take you up on that offer and go ahead and use the bath first."
With a quick peck on my cheek, Wataru left the living room.
"Well then," I said to myself as I got up from the sofa and reached for the dishes left in the sink.
A short while later, Wataru returned, carrying his pajamas and a bath towel.
"Well, I will leave it to you then!"
